SEARCH
Package util

Class ListUtil

java.lang.Object
util.ListUtil
public class ListUtil extends Object
This class contains several methods used to process different lists of items, stocks, and carts. These methods help in searching, updating, and displaying items and their stocks.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ListUtil

      public ListUtil()
      Default constructor for the ListUtil class. This constructor is intentionally left empty as this class only contains static utility methods.

  • Method Details

    • containsCode

      public static boolean containsCode(int code, List<Item> items)
      Search for an item with the given code in the list of items.
      Parameters:
      code - - This is item code to be searched
      items - - this is list where you have to search the item
      Returns:
      true if the item with the given code is found, otherwise false.

    • addOrUpdateStock

      public static void addOrUpdateStock(int code, int itemcount, List<Stock> stocks)
      Add a new stock entry or update the stock count if the item already exists.
      Parameters:
      code - - This is the item code.
      itemcount - - This is the count of items to add to the stock.
      stocks - - This is the list of stock items.

    • getItemByCode

      public static Item getItemByCode(List<Item> items, int code)
      Get an item by its code from the list of items.
      Parameters:
      items - - This is the list of items.
      code - - This is the item code to search for.
      Returns:
      The item with the given code, or null if not found.

    • isInStock

      public static boolean isInStock(int code, int count, List<Stock> stocks)
      Check if an item with the given code is in stock with at least the given count.
      Parameters:
      code - - This is the item code.
      count - - This is the required count of items in stock.
      stocks - - This is the list of stock items.
      Returns:
      true if the item with the given code is in stock with at least the required count, false otherwise.

    • showCart

      public static void showCart(Cart cart)
      Show the details of the items in the cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - - This is the cart to display.

    • UpdateStock

      public static void UpdateStock(Cart cart, List<Stock> stocks)
      Update the stock based on the items in the cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - - This is the cart containing the items.
      stocks - - This is the list of stock items.

    • showAllCarts

      public static double showAllCarts(List<Cart> carts)
      Show the details of all carts and calculate the total sales.
      Parameters:
      carts - - This is the list of carts.
      Returns:
      The total sales amount.
